actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend section 302(c) of the National Labor Relations Act.

summary.text: Amends the National Labor Relations Act to authorize an employer to make contributions to a pooled or individual trust fund established by an employee representative for the purpose of providing or defraying the costs of motor vehicle, homeowners multiple peril, fire, or other insurance benefits for employees, their families and dependents.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 302(c) of the National Labor Relations Act.
